p: Senna occidentalis roots were collected in September 2015 from Al-Debabat city, locality of Algoz, South Kordofan State, Sudan [ 20]. Samples were identified in the herbarium at the department of phytochemical and natural resource where herbarium no. k. 14/96 was deposited at the herbarium, National Center for Research Medicinal and Aromatic Plants Institute, Khartoum, Sudan.
